usa: Hardwick Township, New Jersey was chartered.
Cumberland County, Pennsylvania was created from the partition of Lancaster County, Pennsylvania.
Stafford Township, New Jersey was chartered.
Kent County, Rhode Island was established from the partition of Providence County, Rhode Island.
The Iron Act, which eliminated tariffs on iron imported into Britain from America and limited American manufacturing capacity, came into force.
Governor Jonathan Law of Connecticut died. His deputy Roger Wolcott (Connecticut) succeeded him as acting governor.
